Reviews.Title: Best calendar for busy families
Reviews.Author: Yana Kolesnikov
Reviews.Content: I was searching high and low for a calendar we could share between three adults and two kids in my house. Finally, they came up with something that works great! We can book appointments and record recurring activities from all devices and it syncs up with Outlook account, which brings home and work stuff together. Highly recommend to anyone who struggles to keep it all straight :)

Reviews.Title: Excellent organizational tool
Reviews.Author: Sonya Yam
Reviews.Content: The MagicCal electronic calendar is excellent for coordinating plans with my family. It's extremely convenient to be able to sync plans and events with each other. We mounted MagicCal onto our kitchen wall; it is very user-friendly and looks clean-cut. Highly recommend!
